title: FS: N172 PSA Authentic Tony Mullane or trade

posts.post_title: FS: N172 PSA Authentic Tony Mullane or trade
posts.post_content:
Hello everyone I have a PSA authentic N172 Tony Mullane for sale for $250.00 I will also consider a trade for a N172 John Weyhing with any pose or team variation.  If anyone is interested please message me at [url]wacturner@hotmail.com[/url]
for scans etc.
Thanks
William

moved to ebay auction ends this wednesday 9/21/16.

William
